item.name: Mushroom
item.description: A commonplace mushroom that heals the user by 50 HP. No effect on KO'd characters.

item.name: Green Musrhoom
item.description: A rare mushroom that revives KO'd characters to a quarter of their max HP. No effect on characters who aren't KO'd.

item.name: Frag Grenade
item.description: A powerful fragmentation grenade used by the UNSC. Deals 30dmg to all enemies.
